prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Guitar, Drums, Bass, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Drums, Bass, and Guitar, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Guitar, Drums, and Bass, Reed excluded.

Style 3:
Reed is absent from this song, which is made up of Piano, Guitar, Drums, and Bass.
